asset.name: Pipeline Assets
asset.one_liner: Deep pipeline of 10 clinical-stage molecules including next-gen FcRn (ARGX-213), IgA sweeper (ARGX-121), and first-in-class MuSK agonist (adimanebart)

target.name: Multiple Targets
target.full_name: FcRn, MuSK, IgA, IL-6, Galectin-10, Fn14

biology.simple_explanation: argenx's pipeline spans multiple immunology targets including next-generation FcRn inhibitors (ARGX-213, ARGX-124), the first IgA sweeping antibody (ARGX-121), a first-in-class MuSK agonist (adimanebart), and novel targets entering Phase 1 in 2026.
biology.innovation_engine: 25 active IIP programs; target of 1 IND per year

why_good_target.clinical_validation: FcRn validated by VYVGART; other targets address unmet needs in autoimmune diseases
unmet_need: Neuromuscular junction diseases need novel mechanisms

adimanebart.differentiation: First-in-class MuSK agonist; enhances neuromuscular junction function

argx_213.key_data: Monthly dosing achieved; sustained 70-80% IgG reduction over 140+ days
argx_213.differentiation: Monthly dosing vs weekly for efgartigimod SC; no IgG cycling

argx_121.key_data: Rapid and total IgA depletion within 7 days of single SC dose

argx_213_data.igg_reduction: Sustained 70-80% IgG reduction over 140+ days vs cyclic pattern with efgartigimod

argx_121_data.kinetics: Near-complete IgA depletion within 7 days of single SC dose

catalysts.what_to_watch: Next-gen FcRn with monthly dosing entering pivotal development

key_risks: Early-stage assets carry higher development risk
Novel mechanisms (MuSK agonist, IgA sweeper) without precedent
Execution across multiple programs requires resources

strategic_value.novel_mechanisms: MuSK agonist, IgA sweeper, IL-6, Galectin-10, Fn14
strategic_value.vision_2030: 50K patients, 10 labeled indications, 5 new molecules in Phase 3
